name: MindManager XML Map Theme File
summary: An XMMAS file contains a diagram theme created by Corel MindManager, a visual diagramming application used to organize ideas, plans, and projects. It stores formatting elements, such as the text color and font, shape colors, and the map background, that make up the appearance of a mind map. XMMAS files are similar to the more common .MMAS format but store settings in the XML standard instead of binary code.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
